scripts.compile:all: npm run compile && npm run compile:test && npm run compile:bin
scripts.cypress:report: npm run cypress && npm run coverage:remap
scripts.test: npm run compile:all && npm run set-cypress:all && npm run cypress
scripts.examples: npm run compile:all && npm run compile:examples && npm run serve
scripts.website: npm run compile:all && npm run compile:examples && gulp prepareWebsite
scripts.coverage:prep: npm run compile:all && gulp istanbulIgnoreTypescript && nyc instrument build/es/ instrumented/ && gulp replaceTestImports
scripts.coverage:remap: tsc -p src/tsconfig.sourcemap.json && npm run coverage:remap:html && npm run coverage:remap:lcov
scripts.coverage:post: echo "Coverage can be found in coverage/index.html"
scripts.coverage: npm run set-cypress:all && npm run coverage:current-cypress
scripts.coverage:current-cypress: npm run coverage:prep && nyc --reporter=text npm run cypress:report && npm run coverage:post
scripts.coverage:classes: npm run set-cypress:classes && npm run coverage:current-cypress
scripts.coverage:lib: npm run set-cypress:lib && npm run coverage:current-cypress
scripts.coverage:partial-classes-basic: npm run set-cypress:partial-class-basic && npm run coverage:current-cypress
scripts.coverage:partial-classes-i18n: npm run set-cypress:partial-class-i18n && npm run coverage:current-cypress
scripts.coverage:partial-classes-theming: npm run set-cypress:partial-class-theming && npm run coverage:current-cypress
scripts.coverage:properties: npm run set-cypress:properties && npm run coverage:current-cypress
scripts.coverage:tasks: npm run set-cypress:tasks && npm run coverage:current-cypress
